response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving of $300,000 compared to its true market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial benefits for you in the long run. Should you be interested in proceeding with this offer, please let me know, and we can arrange the details promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
